actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill for the relief of Sascha Glade Weinzheimer, Jean Weinzheimer Jansen, Doris Alexa Weinzheimer. Walter Richard Weinzheimer, and the estate of Walter Weinzheimer.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to five named individuals in full satisfaction of all their claims against the United States for physical loss or destruction of property in the Philippines and for certain detention benefits.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Sascha Glade Weinzheimer, Jean Weinzheimer Jansen, Doris Alexa Weinzheimer. Walter Richard Weinzheimer, and the estate of Walter Weinzheimer.
